characters.name: Yoshiyuki Taira
characters.description: The first recruited member of BECK, Taira is the bassist, and the most talented band member next to Ryûsuke. He plays Music Man StingRay bass. His attitude may sometimes come off as uncaring. He has been seen working as a traffic officer. As the story progresses, we learn that his father was a jazz musician that left him and his mother when he was young.

characters.name: Yukio Tanaka
characters.description: The main character, the series follows his rapid development from living an average life to becoming an outstanding guitarist. Being a weak individual lacking an authoritative presence , he cannot help but let others push him around, a possible metaphoric stereotype on the very proper and manner conscious Japanese society. Recruited as the last member of BECK, he serves as the second guitarist and vocalist, and has a very beautiful voice that is mostly used for Beck's slower songs. He owns a Fender Telecaster.

characters.name: Maho Minami
characters.description: Ryusuke's sister who is a talented singer with a strange relationship with Koyuki. At times she seems attracted to him, at others she brushes him off with little regard to his often ignored feelings.

characters.name: Ryuusuke Minami
characters.description: A Japanese character with a long history in America, he speaks fluent English, and frequently uses both Japanese and English in his conversations. He lives alone in a shack by the fishing pond. His skills and taste in music inspire Koyuki to take up the guitar. The band's creator, Ryusuke is BECK's lead guitarist. A once-younger Ryusuke and Eddie Lee stole the Lucille from the trunk of Syke's vehicle.

characters.name: Yuuji Sakurai
characters.description: The fourth member to join, he was also Koyuki's first good friend, sticking with him even when the school bully and his gang beat him up for breaking the silent treatment on Koyuki. He is the drummer, inspired by his brother, and replaces the original drummer of BECK who followed Ryûsuke from his original band, Serial Mama.

characters.name: Tsunemi Chiba
characters.description: Main vocalist for BECK, he is the key member that Ryusuke needed to bring Taira into the band. His attitude, style, and appearance was based on Zack De La Rocha from Rage Against The Machine and compared to Koyuki, his voice is more punk and rock oriented, like the majority of the band's songs. He also named the band "Beck" after staring at Ryusuke's dog for a few moments. He also tends to pick his nose.

characters.name: Kenichi Saitou
characters.description: Koyuki's guitar and swimming teacher, Saitou once swam in the Olympics but was unable to achieve his dream of winning so has turned his life to teaching others how to swim better. Saitou is loud and demanding in public, and especially strict when it comes to swimming. But when he is out of the water he is much more open, even turning to Koyuki for advice on his attractions to Momo. Saitou is a fan of British rock and his favorite band in the anime is the fictional Rocket Boys

characters.name: Izumi Ishiguro
characters.description: Koyuki's childhood friend, he eventually was left to choose between her and Maho, though by the time he reached his decision, the two girls also reached one of their own, luckily a similar conclusion.

characters.name: Momoko Ogasawara
characters.description: Koyuki's music teacher at school, she gets to know Saitou through Koyuki and they start to develop a relationship through the series.

characters.name: Eiji Kimura
characters.description: Originally in Ryusuke's first band, Serial Mama, he turned into his rival, and his new band, Belle Ame, formed as BECK's competition was mainly succeeding through appeal for the band member's looks and not sound. Getting all the big breaks, Belle Ame seemed destined for greatness, until BECK destroyed their ride to fame, at the cost of being blacklisted in the music industry.

characters.name: Eddie Lee
characters.description: Lead guitarist of Dying Breed, he was Ryusuke's close (and only) friend. It is while they are growing up (and carjacking) that Eddie helped him find Beck (the seemingly patchwork dog) and Lucille. He seems to resemble Kurt Cobain from Nirvana, he can be also based on Eddie Vedder of Pearl Jam or Geddy Lee of Rush.     ~!Just before he died, he entrusted Koyuki with part of his new song "Devil's Way", later Beck completed the song to perform it live in honor of Eddie!~

characters.name: Masaru Hyodou
characters.description: Masaru Hyodo is the chief instigator in a group who bully Koyuki during his middle school days. Hyodo is also a "technically" accomplished guitarist, but as Ryûsuke points out, doesn't have any real feeling or passion behind his playing. Hyodo's father is a famous musician, but his parents are divorced (Hyodo is his mother's maiden name).

characters.name: Rikiya Kitazawa
characters.description: Rikiya Kitawaza is a thug attending Koyuki's middle school and a childhood friend of Hyodo.

characters.name: Tanabe
characters.description: Tanabe is a school friend of Koyuki. His hobbies include photography.
